name: Le Stonk
description:
How to play:

Synopsis:In the game, you take on the role of a stockbroker aiming to make it big on the market. Analyze the values and invest in rising stocks to maximize profits, but be careful not to end up losing all your hard-earned cash. The clock is ticking, you have rent to pay. Aim for the highest score possible before you eventually succumb to massive amounts of debt!

Controls:

WASD movement.

E to interact.

Use the mouse.

Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Credits:

Designers and Programmers.

Tiger Martin

Ben Schelhaas

Gustav Eriksson

2D Graphics, Animation, 3D Graphics.

Oliver Benedetti Yu

3D Character.

3D Graphics.
